bibl.title: An Archive of Ptolemaic Shipping Documents in the Macquarie Collection.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.note: Presents seven documents relating to the transport of tax grain to Alexandria and of seed within the Arsinoite nome. Arsinoite, 234/3 ou 209/8 BC. The archive, attributed to a nome strategos called Chrysippos, introduces new information on the types of cargo, and on the roles of the officials mentioned in loading orders and naukleros-symbola.
